titleInfo.title: File F/5 'Meeting Reports from Manama Municipality'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 200; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains copies of minutes from the meetings of the Manama municipality, along with some translations. The document's subject matter vary across a variety of subjects, all of them relating to municipal administration and the internal organisation of the municipality, particularly its budget and personnel.
